articleContent:
Closed Beta II for Wuthering Waves will commence on 2024/02/19, 10:00 (UTC+8)! Thank you to all the Rovers who have participated in the recruitment for the test. The recruitment for this testing phase will end on 2024/02/07, 18:00 (UTC+8), and the questionnaire entrance will be closed. Please pay attention to the end date. Instructions for test qualification distribution will be announced later. Stay tuned to official announcements!

 

Thank you once again for your continued support and attention to Wuthering Waves!

 

>>>Click here to proceed to the recruitment page and fill out the recruitment questionnaire: https://wutheringwaves.kurogame.com/en/cbt

 

Wuthering Waves Dev Team
articleTitle: Wuthering Waves Closed Beta II Opens on Feb. 19
